tika-s0304t3:2_0: 314.Nibbānaṁāgammāti ettha āgammāti sabbasaṅkhārehi nibbinnassa visaṅkhāraninnassa gotrabhunā vivaṭṭitamānasassa maggena sacchikaraṇenāti attho.
tika-s0304t3:2_1: Sacchikiriyamānañhi taṁ adhigantvā ārammaṇapaccayabhūtañca paṭicca adhipatipaccayabhūte ca tasmiṁ paramassāsabhāvena vimuttasaṅkhārassa paramagatibhāvena ca patiṭṭhānabhūte patiṭṭhāya khayasaṅkhāto maggo rāgādike khepetīti taṁsacchikaraṇābhāve rāgādīnaṁ anuppattinirodhagamanābhāvato ‘‘nibbānaṁ āgamma rāgo khīyatī’’ti vuttaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_3: Addhā attanoti vakkhati ‘‘parassa kilesakkhayena parassa nibbānasampatti na yuttā’’ti.
tika-s0304t3:3_4: Nibbānārammaṇakaraṇena gotrabhukkhaṇe kilesakkhayappattitā ca āpannāti āha – ‘‘kiṁ pana tesu akhīṇesuyevā’’tiādi.
tika-s0304t3:3_5: Nanu ārammaṇakaraṇamattena kilesakkhayo anuppattoti na sakkā vattuṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_6: Cittañhi atītānāgatādisabbaṁ ālambanaṁ karoti, na nipphannamevāti.
tika-s0304t3:3_7: Gotrabhūpi maggena yā kilesānaṁ anuppattidhammatā kātabbā, taṁ ārabbha pavattissatīti? Na,
tika-s0304t3:3_9: Na hi aññe dhammā viya nibbānaṁ,
tika-s0304t3:3_10: taṁ pana atigambhīrattā appattena ālambituṁ na sakkā,
tika-s0304t3:3_11: tasmā tena gotrabhunā pattabbena tikālikasabhāvātikkantagambhīrabhāvena bhavitabbaṁ,
tika-s0304t3:3_12: kilesakkhayamattataṁ vā icchato gotrabhuto puretaraṁ nipphannena kilesakkhayena bhavitabbaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:3_13: Appattakilesakkhayārammaṇakaraṇe hi sati gotrabhuto puretaracittānipi ālambeyyunti.
tika-s0304t3:4_0: Tasmātiādi vuttasseva atthassa nigamanaṁ. Taṁ panetaṁ nibbānaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:4_1: Rūpino dhammā arūpino dhammātiādīsūti ādisaddena lokuttaraanāsavādīnaṁ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
tika-s0304t3:4_4: Kilesakkhayamattatāya hi sati nibbānassa bahutā āpajjati ‘‘yattakā kilesā khīyanti, tattakāni nibbānānī’’ti.
tika-s0304t3:4_5: Abhāvassabhāvato gambhīrādibhāvo asaṅkhatādibhāvo ca na siyā, vutto ca so nibbānassa,
tika-s0304t3:4_7: Yasmā ca sammutisaccārammaṇaṁ saṅkhatadhammārammaṇaṁ vā samucchedavasena kilese pajahituṁ na sakkoti,
tika-s0304t3:4_8: yato mahaggatañāṇaṁ vipassanāñāṇaṁ vā kilesavikkhambhanavasena tadaṅgavasena vā pajahati,
tika-s0304t3:4_9: tasmā ariyamaggañāṇassa sammutisaccasaṅkhatadhammārammaṇehi viparītasabhāvena ārammaṇena bhavitabbaṁ.
tika-s0304t3:4_10: Tathā hi taṁ samucchedavasena kilese pajahīti evaṁ parinipphannāsaṅkhatasabhāvaṁ nibbānanti niṭṭhamettha gantabbanti.
tika-s0304t3:7_1: Suṭṭhu gatāti sammā gatā paṭipannāti sugatā.
tika-s0304t3:7_3: Dukkhasaṅkhātoti ‘‘dukkha’’nti saṅkhātabbo viditabbo ca dukkhasabhāvo dhammo dukkhadukkhatā.
tika-s0304t3:7_4: Yasmā dukkhavedanāvinimuttasaṅkhatadhamme sukhavedanāya ca yathā idha saṅkhāradukkhatā vipariṇāmadukkhatāti dukkhapariyāyo niruppateva,
tika-s0304t3:7_5: tasmā dukkhasabhāvo dhammo ekena dukkhasaddena visesetvā vutto ‘‘dukkhadukkhatā’’ti.
tika-s0304t3:10_1: Dhammānudhammappaṭipanno bhikkhūti dhammānudhammaṁ paṭipajjamāno bhikkhu. Pātanti pāto. Nacirassanti khippameva. Tenāha ‘‘lahuyevā’’ti.
